content: Do you know any jokes about oysters?

Oysters, huh? Let's see... Here's one: Why don't oysters share their pearls? Because they're shellfish! Hehe, get it? They're shellfish and they don't share their pearls. Okay, maybe that's a bit of a stretch, but I hope it made you smile! Do you have any other questions or maybe another joke request? I'm here to help!
